glosses: Without making an explanation, in a vague, unclear manner.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish اورتیلو (örtülü) or اورتیلی (örtüli, “covered, veiled; roofed; shut, closed”), from اورتی (örtü), from Proto-Turkic *ört- (“to cover”), from *ör- (“to plait”), morphologically ört- + -ü (deverbal nominal suffix) + -lü.
